segments.text: From my view, the kitchen looks warm and lived-in, with cabinets and counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries the plate methodically, her apron tied neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look at the sinkâ€”faucet on, water spilling everywhere uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens, lapping at her feet, and she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating how absorbed she is, ignoring the obvious flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack on the counter, ready for her attention instead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the children: boy on the stool, reaching into the cookie jar high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's instability makes my heart race; it's about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He clutches a plate, cookies in hand, while the girl waits below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her open palm shows her excitement for the treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking around, thinking they're clever behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window is so peaceful, with bushes lining the path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene fills me with a sense of impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before accidents happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
